channel.title: 1944 on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 1944 on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 22 Sep 2021 00:00
item.description: Found this 77 year old coin amidst some old papers. Several years ago I also did find a small collection of stamps which I digitized a few years ago. Someone in the family definitely shared this interest in coins and stamps. Oddly, Appa doesn’t recollect saving these!
item.content:encoded: Found this 77 year old coin amidst some old papers. Several years ago I also did find a small collection of stamps which I digitized a few years ago. Someone in the family definitely shared this interest in coins and stamps. Oddly, Appa doesn’t recollect saving these!
